channel.title: [24/7 Server] PK REVOLUTION [Social and Fun] [Staff positions are open] [317]
channel.description:
Pk Revolution #1 PK SERVER
what are you waiting for!?! join now!
LINKS to play -
Forums - http://pkrevolution.webege.com/community/
WEBCLIENT -http://www.rswebclients.com/play/Pk%20Revolution
NOTE: WE ARE LOOKING FOR STAFF AS WE ARE A NEW SERVER.
PK REVOLUTION # 1 PK SERVER 100% PK SERVER. WORKING TORVA. WORKING DCLAWS SPECS. SUMMONING WORKING. WORKING DONATORZONE! LOTS OF SHOPS. WORKING COMMANDS LIKE ::HOME ::TICKET ::WC ::MB AND MANY MORE!
Bosses
Tormented demons Corporeal beast Revenants Bandows godwars Armadyl godwars Zamorak godwars Saradomin godwars Bork & chaos tunnels Barrelchest King black dragon Strykewyrms Penace queen Chaos elemental
BEAUTIFUL CUSTOM HOME!
Features
Flawless switching
Full Mage Bank (Bats, Dungeons, Pirates, More!) Chaotics Summoning Slayer Auras PVP Great PvP and PvM combat Activities including: Dueling w/ staking, Pest Control, God Wars Dungeon, Barrows, Clan Wars, Fight Caves, Warriors guild, & More! Fully working Grand Exchange Jail & Blackmark system Bosses including: Tormented Demons, KBD, QBD, Corporal Beast, & More! Voting rewards Curses & Normal prayers. (Quick Prayers aswell) All spellbooks (Modern, Ancients, Lunar) Vengeance Complete character design Player following Trading Money pouch Dicing Mithril seeds Vine Whip Colored items Money pouch Over 20 trainable skills Brawlers
Much more!
AND MUCH MORE! WHAT ARE YOU WAITING FOR JOIN NOW!
LINKS to play -
Forums - http://pkrevolution.webege.com/community/
WEBCLIENT - http://www.rswebclients.com/play/Pk%20Revolution
